article_title: The Seven Most Memorable Healthcare Books Of 2014, Part One

article_metadata.author: Leah Binder

og.description: This year I offer my list of the seven most memorable healthcare books of the year, in three parts. I begin with Part One today, three books that confront head-on the difficult issue of patient death. On December 29 look for Part Two, the most memorable books on politics and [...]
